name: Encouraging Call
description: A motivational shout from ringside. Provides a small win probability boost with no risk.

name: Coaching Advice
description: Shout technical advice to the wrestler. Legal and helps strategy.

name: Referee Distraction
description: Distract the official to allow for recovery. The AI will narrate a recovery spot.

name: Protective Shield
description: A distraction aimed at neutralizing an opponent's ringside help. Moderate risk of being spotted.

name: Weapon Slide
description: Introduce a foreign object into the ring. High impact, high risk.

name: Cheap Shot
description: A direct illegal strike when the ref isn't looking. Extreme risk of DQ.

name: Trip/Ankle Pull
description: Ground the opponent illegally. Narrates a momentum shift.
